content: Courses: Machine Learning , Data Mining , Data Analytics , Full Stack Development , DBMS

description: Revamped the performance management system using AdonisJS, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, collaborating effectively with the team to ensure seamless functionality.
Developed an application called FIT BIT independently, demonstrating expertise in backend development and problem-solving.
Spearheaded multiple modules, enhancing system performance and introducing advanced features to optimize user experience.
Developed a Customer Personality Predictor application using Flask and Machine Learning to analyze customer traits effectively.​
Designed and implemented the application from scratch, providing data-driven insights for improved decision-making.
Delivered a seamless solution to predict customer behavior, enhancing targeted marketing strategies.

blog.title: User Experience Design – A little more than just design
